Text:
Not sure why this torrent hasn't been deleted but the aspect ratio is definitely wrong. The correct aspect ratio appears to be 1280x544.
It seems a new rip has been uploaded here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7002238/The.Hunter.2011.720p.Rerip.BluRay.x264-SAiMORN

The quality of this torrent is still quite good though and the aspect ratio can be fixed with MKVToolnix.
